entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
